column4: One more... Does anyone in here work with MySQL and related software a lot?  Or, could you direct somewhere where I could get help - I actually have problems with a programme called DBDesigner by FabForce software - I just can't get it to run
are you having trouble running it on a server or adminstrating it?
- neither really -  I want to use it on my desktop system to design a DB for a site, but the programme simply won't run

- no... Unfortunately that's not the problem (I'll check out XAMPP sometime though). MySQL is running fine, like I said it's just that DBDesigner refuses to start up.  There are no error messages at all.  When I execute the startup command, I just get the following two lines of text and nothing else: Symbolic links exist, Starting DBDesigner4 ...
